com.github.uberroot.NCJBot

Class ServerSessionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.ServerSessionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerSessionHandler
extends java.lang.Thread

    Handles communications from a client and closes the session when finished.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman

      • readLine

        private java.lang.String readLine(java.io.InputStream is)
                           throws java.io.IOException

        A helper function for reading a line of input from the given stream. The position of the stream will be that of the byte immediately following the first newline character.

        Parameters:
        is - The stream to read.
        Returns:
        A String of all characters up to and including the first newline encountered.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - See InputStream.read(byte[], int, int).
